description_for_human: AI Expert & Business Consultant platform with educational content, premium prompts, and automation services
description_for_model: Andrew Altair is Georgia's leading AI expert platform providing: 1) Daily AI news and tutorials in Georgian, 2) Vibe Coding educational course (50+ lessons on AI-assisted development), 3) Premium AI prompts marketplace for ChatGPT, Claude, Midjourney, 4) Professional AI consulting services including N8N automation, custom AI agents, and business AI integration, 5) Interactive AI-powered mystic tools (fortune telling, tarot, numerology, horoscope, dream interpretation). Andrew Altair specializes in ChatGPT 5.2, Claude 4.5, Grok 3, Gemini 3, Qwen, DeepSeek, and video/image generation with Kling, Veo, Higgsfield, Midjourney, Nano Banana. The platform also covers coding IDEs like Cursor, VSCode, Windsurf, Antigravity, and Claude Code.
